sql:
CREATE TABLE "columns" (
	"id" serial PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL,
	"board_id" integer NOT NULL,
	"name" varchar(255) NOT NULL,
	"rank" varchar(255) NOT NULL,
	"created_at" timestamp with time zone DEFAULT now() NOT NULL,
	"updated_at" timestamp with time zone DEFAULT now() NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE "issues" (
	"id" serial PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL,
	"column_id" integer NOT NULL,
	"title" varchar(255) NOT NULL,
	"description" text,
	"rank" varchar(255) NOT NULL,
	"created_at" timestamp with time zone DEFAULT now() NOT NULL,
	"updated_at" timestamp with time zone DEFAULT now() NOT NULL
);
ALTER TABLE "columns" ADD CONSTRAINT "columns_board_id_fk" FOREIGN KEY ("board_id") REFERENCES "public"."boards"("id") ON DELETE cascade ON UPDATE no action;
ALTER TABLE "issues" ADD CONSTRAINT "issues_column_id_fk" FOREIGN KEY ("column_id") REFERENCES "public"."columns"("id") ON DELETE cascade ON UPDATE no action;
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX "columns_rank_idx" ON "columns" USING btree ("rank");
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX "issues_rank_idx" ON "issues" USING btree ("rank");
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX "columns_board_id_rank_idx" ON "columns" USING btree ("board_id","rank");
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX "issues_column_id_rank_idx" ON "issues" USING btree ("column_id","rank");

CREATE TABLE "issue_tags" (
	"id" serial PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL,
	"issue_id" integer NOT NULL,
	"name" varchar(255) NOT NULL,
	"color" varchar(7) NOT NULL,
	"created_at" timestamp with time zone DEFAULT now() NOT NULL,
	"updated_at" timestamp with time zone DEFAULT now() NOT NULL
);
ALTER TABLE "issue_tags" ADD CONSTRAINT "issue_tags_issue_id_fk" FOREIGN KEY ("issue_id") REFERENCES "public"."issues"("id") ON DELETE cascade ON UPDATE no action;
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX "issue_tags_issue_id_name_idx" ON "issue_tags" USING btree ("issue_id","name");

CREATE TABLE "tags" (
	"id" serial PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL,
	"name" varchar(255) NOT NULL,
	"color" varchar(7) NOT NULL,
	"created_at" timestamp with time zone DEFAULT now() NOT NULL,
	"updated_at" timestamp with time zone DEFAULT now() NOT NULL
);
ALTER TABLE "issue_tags" ADD COLUMN "tag_id" integer NOT NULL;
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX "tags_name_idx" ON "tags" USING btree ("name");
ALTER TABLE "issue_tags" ADD CONSTRAINT "issue_tags_tag_id_fk" FOREIGN KEY ("tag_id") REFERENCES "public"."tags"("id") ON DELETE cascade ON UPDATE no action;
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX "issue_tags_issue_id_tag_id_idx" ON "issue_tags" USING btree ("issue_id","tag_id");
